pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, October 24, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, October 24, 2016:

Toronto, Ontario

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks and participate in an armchair discussion at the Canada Goose Employee Global Conference.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
